test.description: Flag indicating if the account is in a test mode.

notifiedOnCreativeRejection.description: Flag for notifications on creative rejection.

notifiedOnNewFeaturesEnabled.description: Flag for notifications on new features being enabled.

notifiedOnEndOfCampaign.description: Flag for notifications on the end of campaign.

servingStatuses.description: The serving statuses associated with the account.

notifiedOnCampaignOptimization.description: Flag for notifications on campaign optimization.

type.description: The type or category of the account.

version.description: The version information related to the account.

versionTag.description: The version tag associated with the account.

reference.description: A reference identifier for the account.

notifiedOnCreativeApproval.description: Flag for notifications on creative approval.

created.description: The timestamp indicating when the account was created.

lastModified.description: The timestamp of the last modification made to the account.

currency.description: The currency used for financial transactions in the account.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.
